entry.title: Nestle Turtles - 50 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.59

Nestle Turtles Canadian Candy Bars

They may be slow, but my goodness they sure disappear fast! 
Nestle Turtles are a Classic Canadian confection!  These utterly and completely delicious bites are filled with creamy, golden caramel,  and crunchy pecans while being lovingly smothered in rich, delectable milk chocolate!
A favourite old fashioned chocolate that always has a place at the table! Loved since 1949 and still to this very day!
Treat yourself to the sweet unforgettable bliss of Nestle Turtles!

This chocolate bar is sure to induce a delicious, joyful taste with each and every bite!
Cadbury Dairy Milk Pretzel & Peanut Butter Chocolate Bars are made at the Chocolate Factory on Gladstone Ave. in downtown Toronto.

entry.title: Hershey's with Reese's Pieces - 115 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.49

Two Iconic Candy Brands!

If you’re craving a combination of Hershey’s Milk Chocolate and Reese’s Pieces, look no further. We have the perfect treat for you in Hershey’s with Reese’s Pieces. This innovative 2-in-1 bar from Hershey’s brings you the best of smooth and crunchy textures, together with delectable chocolate and peanut-butter flavours.

This chocolate bar is filled to the brim with Mini Reese’s Pieces candy and chopped peanuts, for a fantastic crunch. You’ll love this candy bar for a pick-me-up snack during those long afternoons. Hershey’s with Reese’s Pieces chocolate bar combines all the best of creamy milk chocolate and crunchy peanut-butter pieces.

115 g

entry.title: Hershey's with Skor Pieces - 90 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.49

HERSHEY’S Milk Chocolate

Almond Stuffed with SKOR bar

Gorgeously smooth classic Hershey’s chocolate mixed with the taste of crunchy Skor bars is what you’ll experience with Hershey’s with Skor Pieces. Skor toffee bits and chopped almonds await within the best of Hershey’s milk chocolate.

Hershey’s has been making chocolate since 1894, so you know you’re in for a decadent experience. Skor pieces are famous for their crunchy butter toffee coated in milk chocolate, and you’ll find this flavour and experience in abundance in Hershey’s with Skor Pieces.

Looking for a treat but can’t decide whether you want a classic milk chocolate bar or the distinctive taste of Skor? This chocolate bar combines both classic flavours into one tempting bar.

90 g

entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.59

New Kit Kat Wafer Bars

Made in Canada

Take a BIG bite into the deliciously NEW, KIT KAT CHUNKY Caramel Wafer Bar (55 g), a BIG, classically crispy KIT KAT wafer layered with decadent flowing caramel covered in a thick milk-chocolatey coating. After all, BIG cravings deserve BIG decadent flavour. Made with 100% sustainably sourced cocoa, all-natural flavours, and no artificial colours, this is the ultimate KITKAT® treat with the added delight of delicious caramel. HAVE A BREAK HAVE A KIT KAT®.

55 g Bar

KIT KAT CHUNKY Caramel Wafer Bar Features and Benefits

  • Crispy wafer with a layer of caramel in a thick milk chocolatey coating

  • Prepared in Canada & made with natural flavours & no artificial colours

  • 100% Sustainably Sourced Cocoa certified by UTZ, as part of the NESTLÉ® COCOA PLAN®

  • NESTLÉ Canada has raised more than $10.2 million in support of KIDS HELP PHONE®

  • HAVE A BREAK HAVE A KIT KAT®

Kit Kat Canada

Kit Kat is one of our favourite Nestle Chocolate Bars! Delicious crisp wafer with the perfect ratio of smooth milk chocolate. Time to take a break!

  • Four delicious fingers of signature KIT KAT wafer enrobed in a smooth milk chocolate coating
  • Nestle purchases 100% Sustainably Sourced Cocoa certified by UTZ, as part of the NESTLÉ COCOA PLAN. They work with UTZ and farmers to improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities
